iconForFeature.bodyText: Create Super Smooth Polycurves and Conic Sections using technically superior: Rational Quadratic B Spline Curves which remain fully editable along the full length of the curve i.e. you can go back and node edit the curve as you're creating it!
Create perfectly horizontal and vertical lines, inc. to any angle with an auto-join feature. Ideal for making fold lines and developing geometric shapes
Curves drawn with the mouse or a pen (freestyle) directly onto the drawing area and automatically smoothed by the program once completed
Flag, 2D Perspective and Cylinder
Apply an Outline by measurement (units) as a separate contour
Adjust Temperature, Saturation, Brightness and Gamma. Set to Greyscale and Reset
Create an Outline around Effects, Images, Objects, Shapes and Text etc. using the Create Cut-Contour module, and now traces very large and complex images with ease!
Find groups of related tools now in an easy to use set of specialist Tool Panels on the right side of the program for much easier and repaid design
Easily switch between documents with Document tabs rather than using a menu item
VinylMaster is set out in a logical and easy to follow layout and uses a highly professional and contemporary Graphics User Interface (GUI) meaning that it's easy to use and to understand

Do most operations in the main designing window with clever live and interactive editing tools (Gizmos) rather than wading through too many pop-up modules which are confusing and hard to find when you most need them
Prevents the Plotter/Vinyl Cutter from Rounding-off Corners and stopping short of completing the cut. Ideal for small text and intricate designs
Comprehensive and dedicated Device Settings module to set and adjust a large number of advanced settings such as Emulation Commands/Language, Units, Origin etc.
Minimize the Plotter's Travel
Extends the Cut just past the start point to compensate for a Cutter's Trailing Blade
Minimizes cutter movement and wear

Interactive Contour Cutting Wizard that supports Auto-Mark (Auto-Detect) Cutters and Laser Pointer Cutters to quickly guide you to Print and Cut on 2 Devices or to Print, Laminate and then Cut on the same device. Easily calibrate your laser pointer and work with rotated artwork
New preset cutting tools/contours, ability to create perforation cuts and fold lines
Easily create an Outline around Effects, Images, Objects, Shapes and Text etc. using the Create Cut-Contour module
Supports all major makes and models which Detect printed Alignment Marks, so you can print from a device then cut from another, or print, laminate and then cut on the one device
Supports all major and popular ARMS (laser sensor) and CCD (camera fitted) cutters for the most accurate of contour cutting
